title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Skills: A Study on Instructor Image and Voice Design Strategies for Online Lectures

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Differences in learning achievement based on instructor image types (original/adjusted/virtual/none) can be compared and analyzed.
Changes in learning satisfaction based on instructor voice types (original/altered/synthetic) can be measured.
Optimized instructor expression strategies for online lectures can be proposed based on experimental results.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
